item.title: #en @ 1440613146788384768
item.description: Just had request for data from 2011, which confirms all the advice I've been given: - You will not remember old passwords - Old hard drives won't work any more - You will have many files called 'final' - Keep your scripts as well as data - Store open data for your future self!
